itunes:title: JUL 14, 2022 - PLAN C: THE BIDEN REGIME IS PLANNING NATIONWIDE MAIL-IN ABORTIONS
title: JUL 14, 2022 - PLAN C: THE BIDEN REGIME IS PLANNING NATIONWIDE MAIL-IN ABORTIONS
description:
In the wake of the overturning of Roe v. Wade, the Biden regime sided with big pharma and declared that pharmacists must prescribe abortion pills to whomever requests them due to their new ‘Plan-C’: nationwide mail-in abortions or virtual abortions. New details emerge on the Biden-cited story about the 10-year-old abortion case in Ohio, revealing that the child rapist is an illegal alien from Guatemala. The Biden team is set to meet with Saudi Arabia to beg for oil; however, Poso makes the argument as to why the Saudis won’t oblige. Amazon admits they gave ring video surveillance to police without the express permission of the owners. 



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


To get $150 off each 3-month supply of ‘My Patriot Supply’ go to PrepareWithPOSO.com and use promo code POSO 


Try Scoremaster for free by going to www.scoremaster.com/poso and use code POSO
